reviews.text: I booked this hotel on friends suggestions and I was not disappointed. As previous reviewers have noted, it is a restored 16th century monastery. The chapel is more than worthy of a view as are some of the many common areas. The hotel sits in a great location in Trestevere, just a short walk to restaurants, shopping, the Tiber and the bridges over the Tiber. The staff is pleasant and accommodating. I stayed in room 123 which was large. It featured both a huge bathtub and separate shower (although I could not get hot water in the shower). There is individual hv/ac in each room which was preset for two of the three days at 23.5 the third day it was turned down to 21 and try as I might, I could never get it to change. These glitches in amenities were not enough for me to reach staff about, I just moved on. The breakfast, included in the cost of the room, was a great way to start the day. The hotel has free wifi in the lobby.
reviews.title: An Oasis in Rome

reviews.text: I stayed here for 2 nights while in Rome for business and thought it was a terrific hotel. The building is a beautiful converted convent and still has an ornate chapel that's part of the building. It's quite lovely and atmospheric, making you feel like you're in medieval Rome.
reviews.title: Excellent, unique hotel

reviews.text: The room was comfortable enough (if a bit small), quiet and the breakfast was great. The hotel is located in the Trastevere neighborhood which is across the Tiber river. You can walk out of the hotel and down a street with tons of low key wine bars, restaurants and shops, but this isn't central Rome. This worked for me and I appreciated being a bit off the tourist beaten path but wouldn't be ideal if you expect to walk out of your room and see the Colosseum.
reviews.title: Great place to stay
Lovely hotel and wonderful staff
reviews.text: Overall a lovely and unique hotel that's well worth the price.

reviews.text: Absolutely loved this place. Beautiful hotel and gardens and the staff could not be friendlier. Also a great location, with fantastic bars and restaurants close by. I will definitely be returning here on my next visit.
